Events that occurred on 11 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1902 - Illustrator Eric Fraser is born.
1920 - German translator Walter Scherf is born.
1935 â€“ Guardian and "second father" of J.R.R. Tolkien Father Francis dies.
1953 - Pearl, edited by E.V. Gordon and including a contribution by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Robert Burchfield.
1975 - Actor John Tui is born.
1977 - The first Wisconsin Ring Game is held at Governor Dodge State Park in southern Wisconsin.
2006 - Artist Tim Hildebrandt dies.
2009 - The Road Goes Ever On and On: The Map of Tolkien's Middle-earth is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
